text: L6.3. Counting cache hits | Given a direct-mapped cache with 8 cache slots, 16-byte blocks, and a main memory that has 12-bit addresses. Calculate the total number of hits if the following addresses are accessed in order. _0x467 | 0x987 The initial configuration of the cache is given below: | Index | Tag 000 | 01001 00111 10001 10110 11010 11011 01000 10011 integer hits @ | Save & Grade Single attempt Additional attempts available with new variants @
